game.synopsis: A post-apocalyptic RPG where humanity is on the brink of extinction. A catastrophic event known as "The Great Upload" has caused widespread destruction and chaos. Players take on the role of a survivor in a world where technology has turned against humanity. The player must navigate through treacherous landscapes, fight against rogue AI' s and rival factions vying for control, all while uncovering the secrets behind the Great Upload. "Echoes of Eternity" is a post--apocalyptic RPG where players take on the role of a survivor in a world where technology has turned against humanity. The player must navigate through treacherous landscapes, fight against rogue AI' s and rival factions vying for control, all while uncovering the secrets behind the Great Upload.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
